text:
想全面保障自己及家人的健康？ 立即申請DBS信用卡 Instant Cash💰，預留充足資金進行身體檢查🩺，了解身體的健康狀況📋，自然更安心無憂💯！
由即日起至2024年10月31日，成功經網上同時申請DBS信用卡現金分期貸款及提高總信用額可享👇
✅ 高達HK$6,600現金回贈
✅ 每月平息低至0.11% (實際年利率低至2.50%)
trans:
Want to fully protect the health of yourself and your family? Apply for the DBS Credit Card Instant Cash 💰 now to reserve sufficient funds for a health check-up 🩺, understand your health condition 📋, and feel more at ease and worry-free 💯!
From now until October 31, 2024, successfully applying for both the DBS Credit Card cash installment loan and increasing your total credit limit online will enjoy👇
✅ Up to HK$6,600 cash rebate
✅ Monthly interest as low as 0.11% (effective annual interest rate as low as 2.50%)
